title: FastMCP Service Obsolete and Causing System Issues
description: Old FastMCP service (standup-sydney-fastmcp-http.service) was failing continuously with 1,272,350+ restart attempts. Service was trying to run missing /opt/standup-sydney-mcp/server_http.py file. This obsolete system should have been deleted ages ago.

solution.description: Solution: Completely removed obsolete FastMCP system: 1) Stopped and disabled standup-sydney-fastmcp-http.service, 2) Deleted /etc/systemd/system/standup-sydney-fastmcp-http.service and reloaded daemon, 3) Removed entire /opt/standup-sydney-mcp/ directory, 4) Cleaned up /var/log/standup-sydney-fastmcp.log. System is now clean of FastMCP references.
